short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks YouTube video feed and recommendations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you stay focused while using YouTube. 

Here's why it's great:

Blocks Distractions: It stops YouTube from showing you videos you didn't plan to watch, so you can stick to what you came for.

Makes You Think: Before you can see more videos, you have to solve a math problem. This makes you stop and think if you really want to watch more or if you should get back to work.

Helps You Choose Wisely: Every time you solve a math problem to see more videos, you're really asking yourself if it's worth your time. This helps you make better choices about what you watch.

For Everyone Who Wants to Focus: Whether you're studying, working, or just trying to learn something new, this extension helps you stay on track without getting lost in endless video suggestions.

Easy to Use: Just add this extension to your Chrome browser, and you're all set. It's simple but very effective in helping you focus on YouTube. No registrations required 

This extension helps you enjoy YouTube without getting sidetracked. It's like having a helpful friend who reminds you to stay focused, but also lets you decide when it's okay to relax and watch more.
